item.title: By: Francesca
item.dc:creator: Francesca
item.description: Ah, the Nigella Lawson classic. This has been part of my family tradition for the past ten years and the number of converts this cake has made is now in the hundreds just from the first tasted baked by a friend's mum. God bless, Nigella. I have yet to meet anyone who dislikes this one.
item.content:encoded: Ah, the Nigella Lawson classic. This has been part of my family tradition for the past ten years and the number of converts this cake has made is now in the hundreds just from the first tasted baked by a friend’s mum. God bless, Nigella. I have yet to meet anyone who dislikes this one.

item.title: By: lili - pikelet and pie
item.dc:creator: lili - pikelet and pie
item.description:
I've made this cake and it really is delightful. I got my recipe from smitten kitchen and it is almost identical to yours. http://smittenkitchen.com/2006/11/ganached-guinness-goodness/ Another recipe from epicurious: http://www.epicurious.com/recipes/food/views/Chocolate-Stout-Cake-107105
http://tinyurl.com/ykk546f
item.content:encoded:
I’ve made this cake and it really is delightful. I got my recipe from smitten kitchen and it is almost identical to yours. http://smittenkitchen.com/2006/11/ganached-guinness-goodness/
Another recipe from epicurious: http://www.epicurious.com/recipes/food/views/Chocolate-Stout-Cake-107105

item.title: By: Von
item.dc:creator: Von
item.description:
Yumm..this looks delicious! and you make it sound so good too!
Will definitely try this.....one day! tehehehe....I wonder what my paren't reaction will be if I asked them to buy me Guiness??

item.description: I love this! So many chocolate guiness cakes in the past few days!
item.content:encoded: I love this! So many chocolate guiness cakes in the past few days!

item.title: By: Lorraine @NotQuiteNigella
item.dc:creator: Lorraine @NotQuiteNigella
item.description: Here here! This cake is da bomb isn't it. So lovely and moist and good. I've seen some people make a Bailey's icing which is very creative and good for the St Patrick's day theme too.
item.content:encoded: Here here! This cake is da bomb isn’t it. So lovely and moist and good. I’ve seen some people make a Bailey’s icing which is very creative and good for the St Patrick’s day theme too.

item.title: By: bake in paris
item.dc:creator: bake in paris
item.description:
The second chocolate guinness cake I have seen this month....... The photos are so intriguing, simply because the icing is so creamy and luscious, topped on a sinful chocolatey cake. Who could resist, right?
Sawadee from Bangkok, Kris
item.content:encoded:
The second chocolate guinness cake I have seen this month……. The photos are so intriguing, simply because the icing is so creamy and luscious, topped on a sinful chocolatey cake. Who could resist, right?

Sawadee from Bangkok,
Kris

item.title: By: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.dc:creator: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.description: All you need is a beer-glass shaped cupcake mould. Although they might not stand up well.
item.content:encoded: All you need is a beer-glass shaped cupcake mould. Although they might not stand up well.

item.title: By: Trissa
item.dc:creator: Trissa
item.description: Anita - you've also converted me with this post! The cake looks so moist and the cream cheese topping - yummy!
item.content:encoded: Anita – you’ve also converted me with this post! The cake looks so moist and the cream cheese topping – yummy!

item.title: By: Barbara
item.dc:creator: Barbara
item.description:
Our Guinness cake recipes are the same... and isn't it delicious?? Everyone loved it. I changed the cream cheese frosting though.
Gammon IS ham, isn't it? No reason the mustard ring wouldn't work with it.
item.content:encoded:
Our Guinness cake recipes are the same… and isn’t it delicious?? Everyone loved it. I changed the cream cheese frosting though.

Gammon IS ham, isn’t it? No reason the mustard ring wouldn’t work with it.
